alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued May 20 at 9:07AM CDT until May 20 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT /6 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. For the High Wind Watch, northeast winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph possible. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains in Texas. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 7 PM CDT /6 PM MDT/ this evening. For the High Wind Watch, from late Saturday night through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: High winds could make driving difficult for motorists driving high profile vehicles such as campers, vans, and tractor trailers. Remember, a High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind is imminent or occurring. And, a High Wind Watch means conditions are favorable for a hazardous high wind event in and close to the watch area.
